short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 一款无与伦比的数据服务API扩展，可以在Chrome上设定API进行查询。
short.en_US: A extraordinary data service API chrome extension, let you request a query in Chrome browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
开源链接: https://github.com/datafe/dataservice-api-chrome-extension

您可以设定任何 API，如根据用户 ID 查询对应信息，也可透过 Webhook 丢到私有钉群等等，减少切换应用的割裂感。

可透过右键将网页上的选取文字传入 API 的参数后进行查询。

如果需要封装大数据 API，推荐使用阿里云数据服务: https://ds-cn-shanghai.data.aliyun.com/
long.en_US:
Open Source: https://github.com/datafe/dataservice-api-chrome-extension

A DataService API Chrome extension can help users to accelerate data mining when surfing web contents. It accept request any APIs and allows pushing data by webhook URLs.

You can passing text selection of web pages into a parameter of an API and request a query.

If you need big data APIs, we recommend Alibaba Cloud DataService: https://ds-cn-shanghai.data.aliyun.com/
